definitions.definition: A response or reply ; something said or done in reaction to a statement or question .
examples: Her answer to his proposal was a slap in the face.

definitions.definition: ( after a possessive , with to ) Someone or something that fills a similar role or position.
( law ) A document filed in response to a complaint , responding to each point raised in the complaint and raising counterpoints .

main_definition: A response or reply ; something said or done in reaction to a statement or question .
secondary_definitions: ( after a possessive , with to ) Someone or something that fills a similar role or position.
( law ) A document filed in response to a complaint , responding to each point raised in the complaint and raising counterpoints .
